Detailed Description

Author:
Jack Owen Shelton CS4322 Project Predator VS. Prey Simulator.
Date:
Spring 2009Predator behavior for Predators that won't pursue Prey unless their hunger factor is greater than .75.

Special method used for updating when a Predator has been noticed by a Prey.

This method doesn't do anything for this PredatorBehavior.
